1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In the year 2018, the economy has hit its lowest point, unemployment is at the highest its ever been since the market crash. America has "impeached" it's president, and rallied behind a man Simply Called "Greer" who they believed would make America great again. Over time Greer eventually takes over the remainder of America and Europe through force. With all this power he is able to create a new world order, where the world is a now dystopian communist society. With the help of the I.T. Corp. which is a policing force bred to keep strict order and hunt down all those who threaten the society. Through years of schooling, all the way to adulthood, the I.T. corps strip humanity of all desires. He believes without desires there can be no temptation, and no temptation means no one can break the law, thus peace is created.
imdb.title: TAG: The Series
